mapper.sql: ID, TRANS_ID, BUSINESS_ID, TRANS_NO, TRANS_TYPE, TRANS_CHANNEL, TRANS_TIME, PAY_MONEY, STATUS, ISVALID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, TRANS_USER_TOKEN, TRANS_INSURE_ID,RESULT_MSG,TRANS_PRODUCT_NAME
mapper.update: update T_BUSINESS_TRANS SET ISVALID='0' where TRANS_ID = #{transId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into T_BUSINESS_TRANS (TRANS_ID, BUSINESS_ID, TRANS_NO, TRANS_TYPE, TRANS_CHANNEL, TRANS_TIME, PAY_MONEY, STATUS, RESULT_MSG, ISVALID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE,TRANS_USER_TOKEN,TRANS_INSURE_ID,TRANS_PRODUCT_NAME) values (#{transId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transTime}, #{payMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resultMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isvalid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW(), NOW(), #{transUserToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transInsureId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transProductName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select from T_BUSINESS_TRANS where TRANS_ID = #{transId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND TRANS_USER_TOKEN=#{transUserToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ISVALID = '1'
select from T_BUSINESS_TRANS where TRANS_NO = #{transNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ISVALID = '1'
